itemDisplayName: Deploy a VM Scale Set with Linux VMs with an Apache/PHP application and Auto Scale configured
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set of Linux VMs using the lastest patched version of Ubuntu Linux 15.04 or 14.04.2-LTS. These VMs are behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections. Each of the VMs run an Apache/PHP application that does some work to eat CPU cycles. Since the VM Scale Set is configured for Auto Scale, as the application eats up CPU cycles, VM Scale Set will scale out and in as needed as per the auto scale rules defined in the template
summary: This template deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections. Each VMs run a Apache/PHP application that can trigger Auto scaling activity based on defined rules
